title: [GAMEPLAY] Arcade Miss Fortune sound effects mixed up
body:
Found 2 bugs with Arcade Miss Fortune in recent games.
1 - If there is a Caitlyn in game (ally or enemy).
When triggering Love Tap, the Arcade Love Tap sound effect will play _as well as_ the sound for the impact of Caitlyns Q, Piltover Peacemaker.

2 - If there is another (non Arcade) Miss Fortune in game.
The Arcade auto attack sound _is replaced with_ the regular auto attack sound.
I was unable to test the effects of having both Miss Fortunes with Arcade skins.

This issue has occurred every time I have played Arcade Miss Fortune with the above conditions, since the 5.22 patch (maybe a half dozen times).
I've also tested in a few custom games and it keeps happening there as well.

To reproduce, start a custom game with Arcade Miss Fortune, bring in an enemy Miss Fortune or a Caitlyn on either team and auto attack something.
Side note, I've only noticed/tested this in normal and custom games, and only on Summoners Rift map.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

I also noticed it, but I don't think that this bug happens with Arcade MF in both teams, I've recently had a mirror botlane game (Arcade MF+Soraka vs. Arcade MF+Soraka) and the passive sound was applied correctly, but you are right with number 1 - it also occured to me.
